attributes.action: Traffic enforcements to stay home and safe lives!
attributes.additional_details:
I’ve been fined aggressively twice on the same address with a valid visitor permit with the reason that I completed wrong. Instead of “V” the agent thought I’ve put “U”. I’ve appealed and never had an answer back. Now I’ve received a order for recovery. It is embarrassing! 
I’ve collected in the last two weeks a set of pictures and video recordings with different agents during their working hours. 
I only can say WOW! Spitting, sneezing and blowing their nose, are just a few.
attributes.background:
1.Their job it’s not essential! Keep them at home during the pandemic 
2.They are spreading the virus on every car! 
3.Cancel all the Parking Fines during the pandemic

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567370
